column5: My wife and I headed out to get some perch today. The wind was crazy, the waved were STUPID but it was a day without the kids so I was going to make it happen.  We ended up going closer to shore than I would have like but we couldn't anchor where I wanted to. But we managed to get a decent amount of fish. We fished for 4 hours and caught over 100 perch and kept 33.  This one was a wee bit sore!      The wind and waved did get a little better but it looked like something was brewing
How did someone who looks like you, end up with someone who looks like her??? Great day out!
Dan, I'm guessing you're the short one, and she's the sweet one. Nice perch..except the one with the sores.
Good job dude some nice size perch there !!!
Nice Dan, glad you made it back safe and sound!  Joey

awesome fish buddy!  I didn't get back to you because I was in London picking up Ginny's bithday gifts - a front load washer and dryer set! LOL    Anyways, if I can get the grass cut, the new laundry machines up and running and a few other things done i'm going to try to take Averie out for a couple hours of perchin' tomorrow afternoon!  I'll fire you a text if I'm heading your way!  Thanks for the report!  Ryan

You sound like T.J. lol   neither   Thanks buddy, Next Sunday I'm gonna find the big girls for the derby!   Thanks Joey, The ride back in would have been pretty wet if I didn't have the full top, or I could have slowed down but that's no fun  and once again congrats!   Thanks buddy, Hope ya got out with the boy today, the rest can wait, unless Ginny has a say in it
Great Report Dan keep them coming Richard
That's the ticket right there.... sharing the water with the mrs and getting into some.... priceless Thanks for sharing Dan Leechman
We don't get out often together but it's always fun
Great report Dan, i dont get out on the water enough with the missus either these days...great fun to fish with her though.  Some nice perch you had.
Thanks Simon, there will be plenty of time to fish with our wives once the kids are older. But that won't be for a LONGGGG time!
awesome day dan congrats to you and your wife
Dan would that derby be Jimmy Riggin's derby? I may give that one a shot. Nice Perchin, looks like Bait Island in the background
Might be a few of us out for that one.  Good luck!
OK Dan... so your wife caught a 100 perch... so what did you do.   j/k.   Good fishing dood!
